title: targeted victim systems
extract: A targeted attack refers to a type of threat in which threat actors actively pursue and compromise a target entity's infrastructure while maintaining anonymity. These attackers have a certain level of expertise and have sufficient resources to conduct their schemes over a long-term period.
extract_html: A targeted attack refers to a type of threat in which threat actors actively pursue and compromise a target entity's infrastructure while maintaining anonymity. These attackers have a certain level of expertise and have sufficient resources to conduct their schemes over a long-term period.
